trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Wentzville
There were no other sightings in Wentzville on or around July 4th 2010
Summary: Glowing object flying horizontally, slow, from southeast to northwest.
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were cleaning up fireworks debris when he yelled at me to look in the sky. approximately 150 feet up we saw a bright yellow\orange glowing object (not flaming, but very bright and glowing) slowly moving horizontally across the sky from the southeast to the northwest. it made no noise. we chased it by foot as far as we could until we were stopped by a thick tree line. the object travelled across the sky at a slow, steady pace for at least one mile until we lost sight of the object. our neighbor's son saw it as well. last that night, still mystified by the sighting my husband sat outside for a few hours trying to see the object again when he saw a semi-transparent object in the sky that was oval in shape and moved horizontally across the sky in the approximately location where the first object was observed; however, this object did not emit any light as the first object.
